revised_title: A Detailed Study of Coal Strata and Veins in Mendip, Somersetshire
tldr: The author provides a detailed description of the coal strata and veins observed in the coal mines of Mendip in Somersetshire. He explains the different types of coal veins, their thickness, quality, and uses, as well as the geological formations and earth strata found in the region. The author also discusses the challenges faced in mining and the variations in coal vein directions and depths.
